Effect.en:
During your Main Phase: You can discard 1 "Tindangle" card, then apply 1 of the following effects, but you cannot discard other cards with the same name with the effect of "Stairs of Mail" for the rest of this turn.
● Change 1 face-down Defense Position monster you control to face-up Attack Position.
● Change 1 face-up Attack Position monster you control to face-down Defense Position.

en: Change from face-down Defense to face-up Attack position
Change from face-up Attack to face-down Defense position
